text:
Gaby Espino celebrates the arrival of a new baby in the family
The family celebrates the arrival of a girl ...
02 Nov 2019, 21:57 by RedacciÃ³n
Gaby Espino celebrates the arrival of a new baby in her life. His twin sister, AndreÃ­na, is waiting for her second baby.



Jaime Mayol, who was Espino's boyfriend a few months ago, was invited to celebrate the baby shower. His presence at this family party has made many talk about reconciliation.
About Andreina's baby it is known that she will be a girl.
Through Instagram Gaby told the public about this party, but did not mention anything about the presence of Mayol, although images of it in the event already circulated on the network.
In her social network the Venezuelan wrote:
â€œLast Saturday we celebrated theâ€œ Gender Reveal â€to learn about the sex of the baby ğŸ˜±ğŸ¤©. I share the first part of the photos because they are many. We spent a very nice family afternoon, and everything was SPECTACULAR thanks to a group of people to whom I always trust all my parties because they are the best ones!






Espino shared images of the celebration but Mayol never appeared on his Instagram.
